title: Correlation functions of the spin-1 analog of the XXZ model
abstract: Exact integral representations of spin one-point functions (ground state expectation values) are reported for the spin-1 analog of the XXZ model in the region $-1<q<0$. The method enables one to calculate arbitrary $n$-point functions in principle. We also report a construction of level 2 irreducible highest weight representations of $U_q(\hat{sl}_2)$ in terms of boson and fermion operators, and explicit forms of related vertex operators.
